predicate.note: Frames file for 'evolve' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class grow-26.2, other framed members include 'develop' and 'grow'. Comparison with 'change'.

roleset.name: change form

example.name: end state only
example.text: Pitney Bowes acquired the core of what *trace* evolved into Wheeler Group in 1979 by buying Dictaphone Corp.

example.name: start and end states
example.text: John slowly evolved from a slightly pathetic individual to a full-blown loser.

roleset.note: The framing for the related verbs 'develop' 'grow' and 'change' are wildly dissimilar. Yuck.
